description:
We introduce a sophisticated multi-speaker speech data simulator,
specifically engineered to generate multi-speaker speech recordings. A notable
feature of this simulator is its capacity to modulate the distribution of
silence and overlap via the adjustment of statistical parameters. This
capability...

title: Quantum Annealing Solutions for the Closest String Problem with D-Wave Systems. (arXiv:2310.12852v1 [quant-ph])
description:
The Closest String Problem is an NP-complete problem which appears more
commonly in bioinformatics and coding theory. Less surprisingly, classical
approaches have been pursued with two prominent algorithms being the genetic
algorithm and simulated annealing. Latest improvements to quantum computing
...

title: Some improvements to product formula circuits for Hamiltonian simulation
description: We provide three improvements to the standard implementation of the ground state energy estimation algorithm via Trotter-Suzuki decomposition.
